text: Hi, I'm trying to access an external API from my site which is fully HubSpot CMS, but the other API doesn't allow cross-origin API requests as a part of CORS. Is there any way to do sever-side requests from HubSpot CMS?

Hey Cory, to accomplish this you're going to need to use some kind of middleware on an external system. Zapier can work well if it's a simple use-case, otherwise you'll need a custom solution using something like cloud functions or an application hosted on a VPS
I'm just trying to retrieve a JSON object from them... so your saying I will need to get a separate server to run the script that makes the call... ok :confused:
<@UGDS256JH> Or you could chain two Lambda Functions together  and "run" them on AWS or Netlify.
^ Bob's suggestion is the more lightweight option, if you don't want to do lambda Google Cloud Functions and Firebase are also options
ok, I'll have to do some Googling on that, because it's greek to me at the moment :smile:
